#include <cstdio>
#include <string>
#include <algorithm>
#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <iterator>
#include <math.h>
const int MOD = 1000*1000*1000 + 7;

using namespace std;
int arr[100000+10];

int main(){
    int t;
    scanf("%d", &t);
    int n, m;
    while(t--){


        scanf("%d %d", &n, &m);
        m--;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            scanf("%d", &arr[i]);
        long long ans=0;
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
            if(ans<0)
                break;
            if(i<=m)
                ans+=arr[i];
            else
                ans-=ceil((double)(arr[i])/2);
        }
        printf("%s\n", ans<0 ? "DEFEAT" : "VICTORY");
    }


    return 0;
}
